Articles.Content:
Seeing as the FAR people have their own little thread to swap tricks, I figure why not make one for all us people that don't use nuFAR? We can still swap tricks and stuff. Just relevant ones for craft meant to work under stock aero.

Here are my latest: 

(latest being a somewhat relative term)

![mLIs3F4.png](http://i.imgur.com/mLIs3F4.png)

Vixen SSTO. Complete whale to get to orbit. 

![kg6rufl.png](http://i.imgur.com/kg6rufl.png)

Drakken SSTS (Single Stage to Suborbital). Should be able to (barely) make LKO, but doesn't quite. Safe to say, I'm having issues designing vehicles that don't use RAPIERs. 

![bxNXBw1.png](http://i.imgur.com/bxNXBw1.png)

KG-21 Fishbait, from the old Kerlington Intergalactic scheme. (In hiatus, probably going to make a proper rocket-building company soon.) 

So sit down, pull up a chair, grab some coffee, and let's hang out, talk about stuff. NuStock stuff.
